meanings.definition: Increase or raise (something) in amount, level, or value.
meanings.sent1: She is upping her game by practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: The company is upping their production to meet the demand.
meanings.sent3: The students are upping their study time to ace the exam.
meanings.sent4: The chef is upping the spice level in the dish for extra flavor.
meanings.sent5: He is upping his savings to buy a new car.

meanings.definition: The act of increasing or raising something.
meanings.sent1: The upping of prices caused a lot of complaints from customers.
meanings.sent2: We need to discuss the upping of our advertising budget.
meanings.sent3: The sudden upping of the volume startled everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The upping of the ante made the game more exciting.
meanings.sent5: The upping of the stakes in negotiations led to a breakthrough.
